include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

cart_ajax_enable.info: Updates the cart as soon as customer changes are made
cart_ajax_enable.label: Enable automatic cart updates

pagination.info: This setting determines how additional pages of products are navigated.
pagination.label: Pagination

swatch_paragraph.content: Add swatch image files to your store's [files area](/admin/settings/files). Make sure the file names match the names of your color variants. For example, a variant called Blue would need a file called 'blue.png'

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

paragraph.content: Displays the average product rating in stars with the number of reviews, for example: ★★★★★ 8 reviews. See [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark).

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content

menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.
menu.label: Menu

currency_header.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

language_header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages)

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the Mega nav to appear from.
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

transparent_header_border_color.info: Only applicable if transparent header is enabled.
transparent_header_border_color.label: Border color

transparent_header_foreground_color.info: Only applicable if transparent header is enabled.
transparent_header_foreground_color.label: Text color

link_text.info: The entire slide will become a link if this setting is left blank.
link_text.label: Button text

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

video_url.info: Direct link to .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/lorenza/image-with-text/#add-a-video-to-an-image-with-text-section).
video_url.label: Video link

list_paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collection blocks. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/lorenza/templates#collections-list)

api_key.info: You'll need to register a Google Maps API key to display the map.
api_key.label: Google Maps API key

image.info: Choose an image to represent your store.
image.label: Image

map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.
map_address.label: Map address

map_link_text.info: Register a Google Maps API key to display the map. Learn more about [registering a Google Maps API key](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/os/customize/map-section-api-key).
map_link_text.label: Map link text

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the article content.
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

show_pagination.info: Pagination will appear when you have multiple blog articles to display
show_pagination.label: Show pagination

image_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the featured image.
image_max_width.label: Max width of image

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content.
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

video_url.info: Direct link to .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/lorenza/templates/#about-pages-settings).
video_url.label: Video link

settings.about_paragraph: Add image blocks to create a compelling image layout above your page content. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/lorenza/templates#about-page)

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content.
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

settings.info: We recommend using an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.
settings.label: Image

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content.
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

paragraph.content: Displays the average product rating in stars with the number of reviews, for example: ★★★★★ 8 reviews. See [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-reviews).

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

show_estimator.info: Estimator will appear only if shipping rates exist [learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/setting-up-shipping-rates).
show_estimator.label: Show shipping estimator

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content

enable_full_width.info: If enabled and image sard is 'Large' this page will span the entire width of the window
enable_full_width.label: Enable full width

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

customer_list_paragraph.content: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the “accepts marketing” [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

enable_popup.info: Show a popup the first time the user's cursor leaves your site.
enable_popup.label: Enable

title.label: This is the Rich text section

link_text.info: The entire slide will become a link if this setting is left blank.
link_text.label: Button text

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

video_url.info: Direct link to .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/lorenza/slideshow-split/#add-a-video-to-a-slideshow-split).
video_url.label: Video link

currency__header.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

language__header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

social_media__header.info: Configure account links in theme settings.

link_text.info: The entire slide will become a link if this setting is left blank.
link_text.label: Button text

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

video_url.label: Video link

cart_quick_shop_show_quantity_input.info: If quantity inputs are hidden, quantities will default to 1.
cart_quick_shop_show_quantity_input.label: Show quick shop quantity input

enable_ajax.label: Show notification when item is added to cart

contrast_header.info: Contrast colors are provided to offer an alternative to your default color scheme. Selecting the "Contrast" option from the "Style" dropdown at the top of a Section activates these colors.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

chip_options.info: Options you want to display as chips. Use a list seprated by commas: Size, Material, Fabric
chip_options.label: Option for chips

swatch_options.info: Options you want to display as swatches. Use a list seprated by commas: Color, Colour
swatch_options.label: Option for swatches
